programme.title: Kristen Stewart vs. Robert Pattinson
programme.desc: S1:E2 Every girl wanted to be Bella Swan in the blockbuster movie, Twilight. When Kristen Stewart auditioned and got the role, she fell in love with co-star Robert Pattinson shortly after, and the world became obsessed with the new young couple. But what Kristen didn’t expect was the endless media scrutiny, paparazzi following her entire life, and the endless craze from fans. After getting caught in a shocking scandal and being villainized by the entire world. But the media got her story wrongKristen had to embrace her authenticity to have the courage to be who she truly was regardless of what the world thought. We dug into Kristen and Roberts romance to find the real life story behind the tabloids.

programme.title: Justin Bieber Vs. Hailey Bieber
programme.desc: S2:E7 Justin and Hailey Bieber are at the height of their careers. So why do they keep getting sick? Our team uncovers this isn’t the first time one of Justin’s love interests has had a life-threatening illness. It all ties back to one question, did Justin cheat on Selena Gomez with Hailey?

programme.title: Ariana Grande vs. Pete Davidson
programme.desc: S1:E11 What made Kanye West go to war against Pete Davidson? Kanye is relentlessly going after Pete, so much so, that Kim Kardashian is concerned about the safety of her new boyfriend. Is it because Kanye knows Pete’s history of controversial relationships? Our team got the real story behind the tabloids, the truth behind Pete’s behavior in relationships, and the journey he went on to truly start loving who he is.

programme.title: The Rise of Charity Witt
programme.desc: S1:E5 Dubbed The Worlds Strongest Barbie, Charity suffered a heart attack when she was only 17 years old, due to being overworked and poor life choices. This health crisis lead her to change her mindset by taking action on changing her life, that put her on a path that lead her to becoming an elite powerlifter, a Strongwoman competitor, a winner of the Titan Games and escaping an abusive relationship.

programme.title: The Rise of Jonny Kim
programme.desc: S1:E3 From the outside, Jonny Kim looks like one of the most ambitious people you’ll ever hear about. A person who can become a Navy SEAL, a doctor and an astronaut all before the age of 40 must be a confident, talented person. However, Jonny didn’t grow up aspiring to be a highly trained soldier-doctor capable of going to outer space. It was only until he experienced one of the darkest, most traumatic things a child could go through, that he discovered a calling way bigger than himself.

programme.title: The Rise of Rocky NoHands
programme.desc: S1:E4 How would you feel if you lost in Fortnite to one of the worlds best players, and found out he was using his mouth as a controller? RockyNoHands is a professional eSports Fortnite player, making a career of playing a video game he loves and being among the best in the world at it. After the darkest moment of Rocky’s life left him paralyzed and motionless in a hospital bed, doctors told him he may never walk again. It wasn’t until a source of pure motivation forced him to dig deep to find his unbreakable drive, that he was able to take on his biggest and most rewarding challenge yet.

programme.title: The Rise Of Damien Rider
programme.desc: S1:E7 Damien Rider was beaten up, thrown against walls, and left all by himself as a child because of an abusive stepfather. After four attempts to end his own life, he decided he needed to deal with his demons by doing the most extreme thing he could do. Discover why Damien felt like he needed to paddle through a deadly ocean and why when he was just about to quit, the entire trajectory of his life would be permanently changed forever.

programme.title: Muhammad Ali's Biggest Fight
programme.desc: Muhammad Ali, a man of conviction and great coherence. He was exactly who he said he was, a brilliant mind who never hesitated to put others first, a truly free man! A documentary made to inspire and motivate.

programme.title: Inky Johnson: Knocked Down to Rise Up - Shattered Dream
programme.desc: Growing up in poverty, Inky Johnson dreamt of a better life -- one where he could provide for his family. A gifted football player, Inky was on his way to this dream -- playing college football & getting named a definite First Round NFL Draft pick, but tragedy struck when he was just 10 games away from the NFL. What happened next will inspire you to never give up on your dreams, no matter the obstacles you might encounter.

programme.title: Life After Genocide
programme.desc: A survivor of war, Clemantine Wamariya was just 6 years old when she ran for her life during the Rwandan genocide. For 12 years, Clemantine and her sister Claire searched for their family, but it seemed all hope was lost... Until they received a shocking family letter that cracked their hearts wide open. What happened? And why did Clemantine want everyone to know her name?

programme.title: Lauren Wasser: The Model With Golden Legs
programme.desc: Lauren Wasser was thriving as a young fashion model, but her life quickly took a dramatic turn when she fell victim to Toxic Shock Syndrome. What started as a normal day for Lauren ended with her being found on the bedroom floor just 10 minutes away from losing her life. Luckily, Lauren survived but was tragically forced to lose both her legs. It seemed like her fashion career was over. But instead, the unthinkable happened.

programme.title: Alicia Kozakiewicz: Friend or Predator?
programme.desc: At just 13 years old, Alicia Kozakiewicz stepped outside her family home and into every parent’s worst nightmare. She’d agreed to meet the “friend” with whom she’d been chatting online for six months, but by the time she realized this man was a deranged predator, it was too late. How did she manage to stay alive? And what traumatic lesson does Alicia want all parents and teens to hear?

programme.title: A Decade of Terror
programme.desc: One day before her 17th birthday, Amanda Berry accepts a ride from her friends dad after her work shift ends, not knowing this decision would cost her freedom for the next 10 years. Watch Amandas incredible story of survival that lead to her eventual escape from Ariel Castro.

programme.title: Billy Monger: Unstoppable Teen
programme.desc: Billy Monger was on the track to becoming a child Formula 4 star. But days before his birthday, Billy suffered a horrendous crash that made headlines around the world and left him in critical condition. Can you imagine your own kid in the seat of a race car going up to 200 MPH?

programme.title: Liz Murray - Resilience in the Streets
programme.desc: At the age of 15, Liz Murray was abandoned by her drug-addicted parents and living on the streets of New York City. Against all odds, she managed to finish high school and graduate from Harvard. How did she do it?

programme.title: Blue or Red pill?
programme.desc: Mindvalley founder Vishen Lakhiani shares the secret to success and teaches a confused student how to make the right decisions in life. The choice is yours: Will you take the blue pill or the red pill?

programme.title: Rock Thomas - Rock Bottom
programme.desc: Rock Thomas delivers a powerful, personal story on how to resist the labels forced on you in order to redefine yourself

programme.title: From Thief to Self-Made Millionaire
programme.desc: Watch John Assarafs personal story of growth, the lessons he learned early on in life, and how he went from robber to self-made millionaire by brushing his teeth.

programme.title: Navigating the Future of Electric Vehicles and Climate Change
programme.desc: "In this episode of Test Miles, we delve into the pressing issues surrounding climate change and the automotive industrys role in it. As New York City hosts the world’s largest climate change conference, we explore how electrification could be a game-changer in the fight against greenhouse gas emissions. With road vehicles responsible for 82 of transportation emissions, the shift to electric vehicles (EVs) is critical for a sustainable future."

programme.title: Root Financial: 10 Steps to get you ready for retirement
programme.desc: In this episode James will walk you through what to consider when you retire and how to know you are ready for retirement

programme.title: Social Security Explained | How to Maximize Your Social Security Benefit
programme.desc: How can you maximize your Social Security benefit? Social Security may be one of your primary sources of income in retirement, and youll learn the tips on how you can be sure to get the most out of your Social Security benefit in todays video.

programme.title: Your Letter From Medicare is COMING - Why You CAN'T Throw it Away.mp4
programme.desc: "This time of year, we all get a lot of junk mail regarding Medicare. Much of it finds its rightful place in the trash. However, one piece of Medicare mail shouldnt be thrown away. In fact, its the most important piece of mail youll receive about Medicare this year. In this video, Marvin Musick explains what that letter is, why its so important, and what you need to do about it."

programme.title: Five Major Changes to Social Security for 2025: What You Need to Know
programme.desc: "Today, I want to shed light on the major Social Security changes for 2025. These updates will significantly impact benefits, taxes, and retirement planning for millions of Americans."

programme.title: Driving Innovation – A Close Look at the BMW i5 M60
programme.desc: "Experience the adrenaline rush as we demonstrate the i5 M60s “boost” feature, propelling from 0 to 60 in just 3.7 seconds. We discuss its striking design, which breaks the mold of traditional electric vehicles with its angular, superhero-like aesthetics and eye-catching LED lighting."

programme.title: The Shift to Sustainable Driving – Hybrids and Hydrogen Unveiled
programme.desc: "In the premiere episode of Test Miles, we explore the evolving landscape of automotive technology as the industry navigates the transition to sustainable driving solutions. This episode dives into the shift from pure electric vehicles (EVs) to hybrids, highlighting how Ford and Volvo are recalibrating their electric aspirations in favor of hybrid powertrains that combine the best of both worlds."

programme.title: See How Much This Roth Conversion Strategy Saved Them
programme.desc: Understanding the tangible impact and the critical factors of Roth conversions is essential. James walks us through a client case study to demonstrate how Roth conversions can significantly impact your retirement savings. But is Roth conversion right for you? James considers five critical factors, looking at the case study of David (58) and Lisa (57), who have a substantial net worth, primarily in pre-tax accounts.

programme.title: Here's the #1 Trap That Will Ruin Your Retirement
programme.desc: Retirement is often seen as a golden period in ones life, filled with opportunities for leisure, family time, personal growth, and giving back to the community. However, there is a common trap that many retirees fall into that jeopardizes the quality of their golden years.

programme.title: Saschiz Old Town, Romania
programme.desc: Saschiz, village, and commune, Mureș județ county is located in central Romania. The villages of Saschiz, Mihai Viteazu, and Cloașterf make up the larger commune of Saschiz. Located in the old region of Transylvania, it lies about 20 km east of Sighișoara"&". First documented in the 14th century, Saschiz is known for its medieval fortress and church constructed by Transylvanian Saxons, a German speaker. They settled in Transylvania when it was part of Hungary. The ruins of the 14th-century fortress sit atop "&"a hill overlooking the village. The late 15th-century fortified church has Gothic details and an imposing clock tower. Along with five other villages with fortified churches, Saschiz was inscribed on UNESCO’s World Heritage sites in 1999.

programme.title: Eight Years of Bad! for July 16, 2025
programme.desc: July 16, 2017. A day that will live in infamy. It was the day that Sir Lord Travis Wright and I invaded the beaches of Normandy… no, it was the day that we got on a space shuttle to become astronauts… well, ok. It was the day we decided to say words about Bitcoin, record them, and share them with the world. Perhaps not as epic as one would like, but it was a pretty big deal for us. Now, eight years later, we are the third longest-running Bitcoin podcast in the english language. Is humanity better for it? Probably not. But we’re still here and today we discuss what eight years in this space looks and feels like. Come with us on a walk down memory lane on this crazy crypto ride

Global Convoy
programme.desc: A bunch of penniless goons are determined to see the world and meet all the wondrous peoples it contains. They buy cars for £150 and totally clueless, set off across Europe, Central Asia, Siberia and then over to the USA and south to Argentina. Years from now, when academics intone about the DIY backlash to a modern society drowning in tech, then this film will be cited.

programme.title: The Mentor
programme.desc: Professional climber Marcus Garcia travels from his home in southwest Colorado’s San Juan Mountains to the limestone cliffs and spires of El Potrero Chico in northern Mexico to revisit his mentor’s final climb. In an emotional and powerful act of closure, he reflects on the accident that took him a decade to talk about—and climbs the route that took his mentor’s life.

programme.title: Micah Creek HD
programme.desc: Follow the Teton Gravity crew as they search for lines in Micah Creek, BC. After being trapped in the lodge for six days, they get a chance to take out the heli and hit some deep powder lines.

programme.title: Switzerland HD
programme.desc: Traveling through Switzerland by train, a crew including Mark Carter and Shroder Baker experience Roitschaggata, huck it off of many structures, and have a close call with an avalanche.

programme.title: Behind the OneShot
programme.desc: Join TGR, Anthill Films, and Brandon Semenuk for the production of his OneShot, one of the most-seen MTB segments of all time, originally featured in unReal, TGR's 2015 bike film.

programme.title: Go Fast Go North
programme.desc: The Race2Alaska is one of adventure racing's greatest competitions - challenging mariners to navigate 750 miles of BC's most infamous waterways by human or wind power alone. The rules are simple: no motors (no, not even as a safety precaution), no outside help or support, first boat over the line wins.. Follow Team Hot Mess, a group of 4 young sailors from BC, as they race the elements, and 46 other teams, to Ketchikan, Alaska.

programme.title: Morocco HD
programme.desc: Tag along with the TGR crew as they travel to Morocco, interacting with the very different culture as they make their way up into the Atlas Mountains.

programme.title: The Hell
programme.desc: A close up motorsport mini docuseries about racing on the worlds most prestigious racetrack.

programme.desc: Bridgestone took Chris to Portugal to ride their latest Adventure Tires, so which one is right for you and your bike? Chris spent a couple of weeks with the MV Agusta Superveloce 800, and he even managed to get it on track.

programme.title: 3074 BATTLE FOR SUPREMACY
programme.desc: Its 3074 A.D., A prison transport ship carrying some of the most dangerous criminals in the galaxy has crash landed on a remote planet. Only two survived the wreck -- one accused of a terrorist bombing of a spaceship and the other, a soldier ordered to ensure the accused prisoner stands trial for the crime. As they journey into the toxic planet the lines between black and white, truth and fiction, are soon blurred and crossed in a mind game of secrets and lies. In this high stakes battle of survival, each becomes determined to control the other in the name of his convictions and faith.

programme.title: JACKIN & JOYRIDIN
programme.desc: Jigga Jones is famous on the internet for showing off high tech crime and how to get away with it. This is the collection of videos that he never intended the public to see. Fueled by alcohol and profanity this video gives you a behind the scenes ride-a-long with the criminal underworld.

programme.title: POETIC
programme.desc: Poetic is an intense, sexy, character driven psychological horror film, that centers on a world full of deceit, passion, and revenge. One couple finds themselves caught in the middle of this when they are kidnapped by Cowboy, a mysterious and merciless renegade killer who takes karma in to his own hands. Now prisoners in their own home, the couple is turned against one another and forced to relive their dirty little secrets. Their domestic quarrel turns in to a nightmare they might never awaken from.

programme.title: Benefits of worshiping Sri Varahi Amman
programme.desc: Sakthi Vikatan is the Tamil spiritual fortnightly magazine from the Vikatan Group. This digitized series covers the various Holy shrines in and around Tamil Nadu.

programme.title: Deivamagal Episode 25
programme.desc: Deivamagal is an Indian Tamil-language soap opera starring Vani Bhojan and Krishna. It was broadcast on Sun TV initially from Monday to Friday and later extended to Saturday at 8 PM from 25 March 2013 to 17 February 2018 for 1,466 episodes. The show replaced S. Kumarans successful soap, Thirumathi Selvam, and replaced by Nayagi. The show is produced by Vikatan Televistas Pvt Ltd and directed by S. Kumaran. This serial was shot in Pollachi, Chennai, Chengalpet, Hyderabad, Kerala, Puducherry, and Cuddalore. This is the first TV serial shot in the Bay of Bengal Plot Prakash his wife Sathyapriya and his eldest sister-in-law Gayathris conspiracies against their families to conquer Prakshs ancestral property Jai Hind Vilas.

programme.title: Interview with DJ Black
programme.desc: Welcome to Tele Vikatan, your one-stop destination for everything television! Get ready to immerse yourself in the captivating world of TV shows, exclusive interviews, soap opera reviews, and more. Our dedicated team is here to bring you the latest updates and behind-the-scenes insights from the exciting realm of television. Discover the thrill of your favorite television dramas as we delve into their gripping storylines and unforgettable characters. Join us as we go beyond the screen to explore the lives of your beloved TV stars through exclusive interviews, where they share their experiences, anecdotes, and behind-the-scenes stories. At Tele Vikatan, we are passionate about delivering high-quality content that caters to the diverse tastes and interests of our viewers. Whether youre a fan of heartwarming family dramas, thrilling mysteries, or gripping romance, we have something for everyone. We provide you with informative and entertaining videos that enhance your TV viewing experience. With Tele Vikatan, youll never miss a moment of the television magic.

programme.title: Freshara Picklz: A Tasty Journey of Success and Innovation

programme.title: Tarantula Twist
programme.desc: A wealthy eccentric bureaucrat from South America is saunters into the tea shop one day. Chai Raja is eager to please the bureaucrat and cordons off a VIP section for him- however such demarcations are of no consequence when Basha and Sundar are locked in a manic chase. The naughty Basha manoeuvres Sundar into crashing past the barricade and upsetting the careful setup. The blustering bureaucrat is all set to throw a fit when suddenly he sees something and shrieks in childlike delight. Its a massive spider that often lurks about the tea-shop. Fishing out a delicate collectors glass case with exotic arachnids, the foreigner eagerly points at the one missing species that he has not yet managed to bag. He wants the spider Pronto! Chai Raja orders Sundar to nab said arachnid but Sundar is frankly freaked out. He gingerly sets about his task as the bureaucrat taps manicured fingers in impatience but finds its not going to be easy as Basha just to spite Sundar has decided to team up with the Tarantula and preserve the latters freedom. The tarantula in its turn, is no pushover and proves deft and spinning inventive webs that not only trap people but bounce them off or string them up etc. The many booby traps Sundar lays all backfire and finally end in bureaucrats glass case rupturing and the collected chasing the collector. While Sundar gets his spatula dues from Chai Raja. Basha and the Tarantula hi-five- one against seven

programme.title: See The Problem
programme.desc: Sindbad is an extra-terrestrial, living his life on earth as a 14 year old boy. He and his friends Zac, Lana and Lee live regular lives, doing all the things that kids do: going to school, hanging out with friends, playing sports and computer games, doing homework and pushing back against their parents. After school, the extraordinary adventures begin. With a spaceship stored in the basement they are able to travel to planets in the 7 Galaxies. Sindbad discovers his special powers step by step. As leader of the team, he takes his friends on missions, trying to save the 7 Galaxies from disaster.

programme.title: Cryyyy-stal
programme.desc: Its valentine day and Dunky has got a small crystal cupid as a gift for his girlfriend. He has care fully kept it on the table…

programme.title: Paintastic
programme.desc: Dunky has been entrusted the task of painting the house. While he is out and about religiously doing his chores a wild chase between Keet and Cat is going on in the background.

programme.title: Road Trip Snag
programme.desc: Don and Colonel is on a journey in their house on wheels. But hey! With the rats around, will they ever have a peaceful anything??? It is indeed a fun for the trio, but not for poor Don and Colonel. The house on wheels turns into a madhouse on wheels!

programme.title: BeAFriend
programme.desc: Zoonicorn Kids Songs

programme.title: TEA-THING TRAUMA
programme.desc: Chai Rajas old aunt, a lady who is pencil thin and frail as a willow turns up for a visit. Sundar believes she is a sweet toothless granny, the wallpaper kind- but what he or Basha for that matter dont anticipate is the granny to have a voracious appetite. The granny gobbles up just about anything in sight and the trays barely make it out of the kitchen to the customers. Sundar almost catches her red-handed and when questioned by Chai Raja for the missing snacks blames her- in return he gets a sound thwack on his head as a furious Chai Raja points at his granny who beams wide- she is toothless! How can she eat without teeth! Demands Chai Raja. Sundar too is perplexed and so is Basha who too is annoyed to find his normal share of fritters missing. Basha and he team up to corner the artful granny. They soon discover that she has a hidden pair of dentures that she uses conveniently to chew down the chow. With Bashas help, Sundar manages to snatch away the dentures and the shop erupts in chaos as the granny proves that she too has quite a killer aim with plates! She retrieves the dentures and is about to chomp down in triumph when Chai Raja happens on her. But all the sweet-natured Chai Raja does is pack some extra fritters for her as she bids him a goodbye while an exasperated Sundar chases Basha from again raiding the shelves.

programme.title: Party
programme.desc: GrandPa has gone out of town for some days and Cat has planned a cool party with the neighbouring cats. All he has to do is to get Dunky out of the house for some hours and continue his party.

programme.title: Dragonfish Lake
programme.desc: The twins are out skateboarding and delivering newspapers to homes around Abra-Dabra, but Uncle Charlie warns them it can be dangerous as it might hit someone. But thinking of the possibility of the idea, Charlie tries a hand at throwing a newspaper onto Tiggy’s lawn, but ends up flying in through the window. On hearing a scream, Charlie rushes in apologising for hitting Tiggy, but it turned out that Tiggy was moaning for what he read in the newspaper. It was about a contest of the Chef Challenge Award featuring whether Tiggy’s rival, Chef Alfonse could win it. Tiggy always wanted to win the challenge but never knew what original recipe to make. Tiggy gets jealous as he reads Chef Alfonse’s fish-a-la mode recipe that he promises to create the dish himself and if turns out to be really good as the newspaper says it is, he will admit how good his rival really is. So Tiggy waits a long while at the lake to catch a fresh fish as the recipe calls for it. Soon all his friends come over to help him fish, each with their very own fish lines. Seems a little magical assistance can help this time. But the lake is now occupied by one big playful dragon fish. The dragon fish turns out to be really hungry, so Tiggy sets out to make the biggest beetroot and berry snack ever. The dragonfish gulps it all down happily, but Deedee is sad she couldn’t really help Tiggy with the recipe. Tiggy on the other hand is quite ecstatic that he was able to whip up the most original dish ever. So over pancakes the next day Tiggy discovers that he has been awarded the annual Chef Challenge Award for the most original beetroot and berry recipe based on the photo and information Deedee gave to the judges. Tiggy is delighted to see an appreciative comment by Chef Alfonse that Tiggy’s surprise-a-la dragonfish being totally top-notch.

programme.title: SOMETHING STINKS
programme.desc: Negu has his henchmen pump a foul green fog up to the Yan World, forcing the Elders to evacuate the Westerly Breeze. Aboard the Lord of the Wind, Pai fails to impress the Elders and gets “Rocky Rodent” – a crisis of confidence. The Elders have to pump Pai’s confidence back up so he can help Xia and April defeat the Worm Monster sent by Negu.

programme.title: Never Give Up - Odessa
programme.desc: Zoonicorn Kids Songs

programme.title: The Violinist
programme.desc: Gummy finds an old violin and, on discovering that he’s a distant descendant famous musician of “Gummy Stradi-bear-ius”, he starts playing the violin non-stop... driving everyone around him completely nuts.

programme.title: The Big Freeze
programme.desc: Charlie is found napping on the job. Deedee and Nino encourage him as being the best postman ever and that anyone would doze off in the sweltering heat. Charlie assures Tiggy that he will take special care of Tiggy’s parcel and off he goes near fainting in the sweaty heat. Charlie even turns down the twins offer to help. In the heat, Charlie makes a wrong turn and reaches town-hall instead of Tiggy’s home, but still presses on to accomplish his mission. En route the special package starts to leak unawares of Charlie who is too tired and stops for a “quick” nap after nearly bumping into the Doobydoos. Deedee and Nino are searching for Charlie and find him at long last. Dejected, Charlie calls himself the worst postman in the world having melted all of Tiggy’s vanilla ice-cream. Charlie wishes Deedee to use her magic, much to the horror of Nino who hides off. Deedee’s magic refreezes not only the ice-cream, but Charlie as well! Rounding up Deedee’s friends they all take turns in delivering the letters and special parcel to keep Charlie’s goodwill intact. Mewmew is too fast that the letters fly our of the bag and the Doobydoos are too short to reach the mail boxes and the twins have a tough time reading the addresses. Finally all the tired and thoroughly perspired friends acknowledge how great Charlie is as a postman. As Charlie is now free to move, they are all surprised by Tiggy’s special delivery of ice-creams he specially made for him favourite postman. Charlie gets a well deserved nap right in front of his giggling friends.

programme.title: Smorigins
programme.desc: The Super Six go back in time to find out the origins of the Smighty Stones. The Villains tag along, too and find themselves in the middle of a prehistoric dragon battle.

programme.title: Sneezils
programme.desc: When Sneevil creates the Sneezils flu, all the Smighties get infected, except for Zip who has to take care of them while defending the Castle from Villains.

programme.title: Meep Meep Charlies
programme.desc: Boris and Sandy are fighting over the water sprayer and drenching Uncle Charlie with it. This leaves Charlie with no choice but to call on Deedee’s magic. Deedee finds a spell to make friendship dust as the perfect solution. Whoever the dust falls on will be best friends with whoever they see first. Happy for getting the magic powder they all set off to see Boris and Sandy. But on the way the Doobydoos rush at them so suddenly that they fall all over them and the Doobydoos become friends of Charlie and carry him off. Nino tries to explain the situation to Deedee, but she is too busy to listen. Back over at Charlie’s, the Doobydoos are treating him as a king and tries to run away from his new friends. Deedee finds some of the missing magic powder but tries to find Charlie. Deedee tries to bring things back to normal with magic, but Nino is against it. They find a way to get the twins to work together and splash the Doobydoos with water and wash off the friendship dust. The twins are friends again even though Deedee’s magic didn’t work as expected.

programme.title: FOREIGN DREAMS
programme.desc: A European couple visits the shop and they are thoroughly impressed by Chai Rajas cooking skills. They instantly give him a flight ticket to Europe to open a restaurant there. Chai Raja is already daydreaming about his wonderful hotel life in Europe. He puts a board in front of the shop HOTEL CLOSED, shuts down business and get ready to pack his things. Sundar and Basha are both shocked! Now they have to do everything in the world to make Chai Raja stay back. They try to bring back customers, try to mess up Chai Rjas preparation. Even the customers help the duo in stopping Chai Raja in a nice way. Basha is not happy with Sundars tricks and Sundar is not happy with Bashas. This inadvertently leads to a manic chase between the two. But Chai Raja screams to stop the duo. The next moment Chai Raja takes his baggage and is about to leave. When he sees the crowd of customers sadly waiting outside to bid him good bye. The wrestler even comes and hugs him crying. Sundar is sad. Basha is sad. Chai Raja cant take this. He tears the ticket into pieces, goes inside the hotel, turns on the radio..and STARTS MAKING TEA!!! Everything is back to normal including the duos chase.

programme.title: Cat and Keet Went up Hill
programme.desc: GrandPA has taken the trio for a small holiday in the high hills. Its very cold and surrounded by snow. t

programme.title: Be a Friend, Make a Friend
programme.desc: Zoonicorn Kids Songs

programme.title: What CeCe Saw
programme.desc: Upon discovering the Creepy Candy TM fooling around in his secret laboratory again, Victor crams them into his lunchbox. Soon after, he bumps into CeCe OMalley, the new girl at school, and their lunchboxes accidently get switched. Once Victor realizes this He chases after CeCe to keep her from opening the lunchbox.Can Victor get to her in time before she opens the lunchbox? Can he stop her from discovering his secret about the Creepy Candy TM? Will Cece learn about the other creepy secrets the old library holds?

programme.title: Smighty Jam
programme.desc: Nardy doesnt believe he will ever be a good athlete, but Zap teaches him to trust his instincts and use Smighty Basketball skills to stop the villains from stealing the Smighty Stones.

programme.title: Street Cats
programme.desc: Cat is king at GrandPA’s house but out on the street it’s a different story. The “Mean Cats” are a local gang of street cats that always pull a fast one on Cat.

programme.title: Super Fun Color Run
programme.desc: Sneevil tries to sabotage the Smighties annual Colour Festival by cementing the competing Smighties with his newest contraption. The Super Six must get colorfully creative to stop him.

programme.title: Christmas Episode
programme.desc: Its Christmas time and Gummy Bear and all his pals are out to celebrate Christmas. They are going to have some serious fun along with some surprises!!

programme.title: PAI THE PIRATE
programme.desc: When the Guardians stumble across a treasure map, Pai happily starts playing pirate, eager to find the treasure. But the Elders warn them about the dangers of treasure, and take the map. Negu sends mutant pirates to attack the Guardians! About to walk the plank, the Guardians convince the pirates to go look for the treasure. While the pirates are distracted by the treasure, the Guardians escape to the Lord of the Wind, from which they defeat the pirates. The treasure proves to be nothing more than a bean. Pai tosses it over his shoulder, unaware that it grows into a giant stalk!

programme.title: The Fallen Star
programme.desc: Maestra Saku teaches the Guardians how to connect with the constellations and make use of their powers. Pai is terrified of bats, but when a meteorite falls into the Shadowy Hollow, he has no choice but to connect with the bat constellation. As a result, he manages to beat the Rock-Eating Mutant and his phobia at the same time.

programme.title: Let Go - Jomi
programme.desc: Zoonicorn Kids Songs

programme.title: FREAKY FRUIT
programme.desc: Deep in the dojo, the Fruit Ninjas discover some powerfully magical fruit, but their secret is discovered by the Clean Bee.

programme.title: Kitten up a Tree
programme.desc: When Gummy comes upon a kitten stuck up a tree, he and the gang become increasingly caught up in trying figure out ways to get it back down.

programme.title: Like A Bridge Over Troubled Teeter Totters
programme.desc: Pancake helps the Zoonicorns “imagine” a bridge across the Sticky-Icky River, but it comes out completely wrong, and he must learn not to give up and that just because something ended up a bit different than planned that it still can’t do the job. Don’t give up if something doesn’t go exactly as planned; keep trying and be creative.

programme.title: A Lucky Accident
programme.desc: Maple accidentally breaks Pancake’s favorite toy, and he blows up at her. Pancake gains a different perspective about his reaction when, in the Zooniverse, he accidentally breaks a gigantic weather making machine, creating an assortment of weird weather conditions that threaten the Zooniverse. Be slow to lay blame when accidents happen; and resilient in solving the problems when they do.

programme.title: TUNNEL OF WHUH
programme.desc: After limited success with the direct assault approach, Durian grey employs some more underhanded tactics to destroy the Ninjas from the inside.

programme.title: I Love My Family the Most
programme.desc: A boy who likes to swim falls into the sea and sinks. There are many delicious foods in the fairy castle in the sea that saved the boy, but the boy misses his family on land.

programme.title: Stone Soup
programme.desc: WI-Go the traveler is starving and has nothing but his brain. He ends up making the most delicious soup in the world using a mysterious stone without using a single penny.

programme.title: Is that dog trained?
programme.desc: Ragoo gets off the lead in a fantasy world and the twins have to train him.

programme.title: The Fast Track
programme.desc: When Zile Zazic is released on house arrest and brought back to the school, a new Security Team is brought in to protect him from the Shadowy Organization. Speed eventually realizes that the Security Team is actually part of the Shadowy Organization sent in to get a scan of the Mach 6. In thwarting the Shadow Orgs plans, Speed discovers that there is another missing piece to the Mach 6s engine.

programme.title: Holiday Resort
programme.desc: Don and colonel are about to start their wonderful holiday in an elite resort. Instead, they don’t even spend a single peaceful second in the place. Thanks to the mad rats! At last when the dogs leave the resort, they plan a nasty trap for the rats. But the rats are too smarttt…..

programme.title: Catch That Bird
programme.desc: Don has adopted a baby pigeon, but can he save it from 5 grumbling tummies? The three mice, Balu and Colonel are adamant on having baby pigeon pie and a mighty havoc ensues. But the kin & kith of the little pigeon have other plans and you have to watch to find out who ultimately ends up on the stove!

programme.title: Remote War
programme.desc: Don and the terrific trio are at war for the TV remote. It all comes down to a swallowed remote that changes channels with every hiccup. Now that is very convenient. The mice get ready in Scuba Gear to perform a close tummy surgery to save the remote. Will sentimental soap or Jolly Good cricket win the Toss?

programme.title: A Fright Night
programme.desc: It is late night movie day and Don and Colonel are watching Dracula. Don is shell scared and the rat trio has a superb idea. Now with Charly, Marly and Larry trying all sorts of pranks, it is utter fright night for Don and Colonel. But even the rats come to fear Dracula… How???

programme.title: Music Mayhem
programme.desc: Whoever heard of Ipods short circuiting? To add to that rigged head phones, musical bombs and bombastic explosions that takes them to outer space. The brother duo gets mummified ultimately but still there is no end to this musical mayhem.

programme.title: Mess at Museum
programme.desc: Dunky takes Keet and Cat to the towns museum which is inside a home to a lot of precious artifacts.

programme.title: Afraid of the dark
programme.desc: In a northerly winter world, the twins meet a snowman who is afraid of the dark -- and too scared to travel through the night to enjoy the Northern Lights with his friends.

programme.title: Cardboard Roll
programme.desc: Watch Hepi and Briko give toilet paper rolls a second more exciting life!

programme.title: Rest-O-War
programme.desc: A cookbook open on his left, and tears in his eyes as Don chops onions. Colonel is the new restaurateur, and Don the head chef. All the food is being diverted into the trio tummies. Frustrated of waiting, would the customers ever be served?

programme.title: The Vegetarians
programme.desc: We start the episode with Cat holding an upset stomach and at doctors place with Dunky and Keet. The doctor tells him he cannot have non veg and should be on a veg diet.

programme.title: THE PAI WHO CRIED WOLF
programme.desc: To discover his powers as the Rodent Warrior, Pai goes on a solo night quest. But he keeps seeing the Wolf Warrior (Koto and Amkko in a disguise made by Mei). He runs to tell April and Xia, who don’t believe him. He battles the Wolf Warrior, discovering his Rodent Warrior powers (Super-Burrowing and Super-Cheeks) as he reveals Koto and Amkko inside the disguise.

programme.title: Cricket Match
programme.desc: Keet and Cat decides to play a game of cricket in the backyard with their own set of teams.

programme.title: Ant Attack!
programme.desc: It is a usual day in the house with the war between the dogs and the rats. And there is a new group. In fact an army of enemies – ants! And they make the life in the house a living hell. For the first time Don , Colonel and the rat trio get a real taste of the bad ants.

programme.title: The Dance
programme.desc: Speed and the gang discover that the Mach 6s mysterious jump capability is actually related to Time Travel. Meanwhile the Shadowy Org. is remotely using a device to affect Speeds control over the Mach 6s jumps. Speed realizes this device is what controls the cars ability to jump through time and that it could be the missing part of the Mach 6 engine. They discover that when the parts are combined, the Mach 6 will be a fully functional time machine.

programme.title: SuperCat
programme.desc: Cat watches his favorite super hero “SuperCat” on tv and is inspired to be like him in every way even fly like him.

programme.title: Money In The Bank
programme.desc: Money money money! Dons safe is full of money. And colonel suggests to put the money in bank. But, Charly Marly and Larry want to become rich!!! and they will just not let go of the money. It is pandemonium in the house and the bank. Bang bang bang!

programme.title: Baghdad in Bloom
programme.desc: Aladdin buys magic seeds from the market with the food money believing the plant will bring him riches. However when it doesnt grow he and Jamillah enlist Genie to help, he does his thing and suddenly the plant grows! Everyone in town hears about the plant and comes to see it in Aladdins garden - hoping that they too will get blessed with riches. Even the Sultan comes to see its beauty. The crowd waits with bated breath but when it opens - it stinks like smelly cheese. The crowd disperse but the Sultan is transfixed by the rare scent. He sees the value and beauty in it where others dont and gives Aladdin gold in exchange for the plant.

programme.title: Acorns – Little Red Ridding Hood Case 3
programme.desc: The fairytale detective SANDRA and her assistant, the elf FO, travel into the story of LITTLE RED RIDING HOOD, to discover that the HUNTER has just accidentally wounded himself in the foot, before the story begins. This is a really serious problem: if the HUNTER is out of action, what will happen in the story? Who will save LITTLE RED RIDING HOOD and her GRANDMOTHER from the evil WOLF? SANDRA and FO will make every effort, using all their ingenuity, to prevent the WOLF from devouring LITTLE RED RIDING HOOD and her GRANDMOTHER

programme.title: Kidnap Mayhem
programme.desc: One night a group of Bandits come to GrandPAs house to kidnap him. In a scheme of confusions the bandits manage the kidnap and arrive at a lonely warehouse on the outskirts of the town.

programme.title: The 22.30 Express – Little Red Riding Hood Case 2
programme.desc: SANDRA and FO travel into the story of LITTLE RED RIDING HOOD, having been called out by her and her GRANDMOTHER. When the detective and her assistant arrive, they discover that it has been a year since the FEROCIOUS WOLF unsuccessfully tried to eat LITTLE RED RIDING HOOD and her GRANDMOTHER. Since then, the FEROCIOUS WOLF has been in jail, while LITTLE RED RIDING HOOD and her GRANDMOTHER became the most popular and best-loved people in the community. Everything changed a week ago, when a series of mysterious crimes began in the village and the surrounding area. Everything would seem to indicate that these were committed by LITTLE RED RIDING HOOD and her GRANDMOTHER, who all the villagers now hate. SANDRA and FO must find the real culprit, to demonstrate the innocence of LITTLE RED RIDING HOOD and her sweet GRANDMOTHER

programme.title: Marathon Hitch
programme.desc: IT is the running race and Don and Colonel are trying out everything possible to win. Ans when the rat trio enter the scene, the race becomes a war. But, as the wise say, slow and steady wins the race. There is an unexpected winner. And our heroes go back to their daily race.

programme.title: Laundry Business
programme.desc: It is laundry day for Don. And the rats are blocking his way from the first step itself. The whole place is a mess. But when Colonel comes in the picture, the war goes to the next level. Thanks to the rats, Don and Colonel now have nothing to wear.

programme.title: THE PAI WHO CRIED WOLF
programme.desc: To discover his powers as the Rodent Warrior, Pai goes on a solo night quest. But he keeps seeing the Wolf Warrior (Koto and Amkko in a disguise made by Mei). He runs to tell April and Xia, who don’t believe him. He battles the Wolf Warrior, discovering his Rodent Warrior powers (Super-Burrowing and Super-Cheeks) as he reveals Koto and Amkko inside the disguise.

programme.title: DOG DANGER
programme.desc: Practicing her Warrior Transformation, April gets stuck as a panther. Using a newly discovered elevator, Negu sends a big Mutant Dog up to chase April’s cat. Pai and Xia manage to train the dog, having it fetch Pai’s stick and rewarding it with delicious mushrooms.

programme.title: Silly Smighty Day
programme.desc: Its Silly Smighty Day and Zap thinks hes just too serious of a Smighty to show his silly side. But all that changes when Sneevil and Biggs transform Smighties into helpless puppies. Now Zap has to put on the act of a lifetime and pretend to be a puppy to stop the Villains.

programme.title: PAI THE PIRATE
programme.desc: When the Guardians stumble across a treasure map, Pai happily starts playing pirate, eager to find the treasure. But the Elders warn them about the dangers of treasure, and take the map. Negu sends mutant pirates to attack the Guardians! About to walk the plank, the Guardians convince the pirates to go look for the treasure. While the pirates are distracted by the treasure, the Guardians escape to the Lord of the Wind, from which they defeat the pirates. The treasure proves to be nothing more than a bean. Pai tosses it over his shoulder, unaware that it grows into a giant stalk!

programme.title: Distemper Tantrum
programme.desc: Maple has difficulty learning to float in the Zooniverse. Be persistent and you can learn to stay calm by thinking happy thoughts.

programme.title: Tarot Tales
programme.desc: A fake yogi loses his forecasting parrot and is in search for a replacement. As he passes by GrandPA’s house he sees Keet and wants him as his fortune telling parrot.

programme.title: Scary Face
programme.desc: Pancake over-teases Maple with his new “scary face,” then gets a taste of his own medicine in the Zooniverse when, as the old saying goes, his face freezes that way. Just because you think something is fun or funny doesn’t mean everybody else is having the same good time you are.

programme.title: Lets Get Kraken
programme.desc: Sindbad is an extra-terrestrial, living his life on earth as a 14 year old boy. He and his friends Zac, Lana and Lee live regular lives, doing all the things that kids do: going to school, hanging out with friends, playing sports and computer games, doing homework and pushing back against their parents. After school, the extraordinary adventures begin. With a spaceship stored in the basement they are able to travel to planets in the 7 Galaxies. Sindbad discovers his special powers step by step. As leader of the team, he takes his friends on missions, trying to save the 7 Galaxies from disaster.

programme.title: Sneaky Genie
programme.desc: When the Dude finds a bottle on the beach, he uncorks it and finds a genie. But instead of granting wishes, this genie turns out to be Sneevil who steals all of the Smighty Stones. The Super Six must combine forces to turn the tables on Sneevil!

programme.title: A CLEAN BREAK
programme.desc: The Guardians want a maid to clean up their mess. The Elders object, but a maid answers Pai’s ad – a ROBOT maid, that is, who turns out to be Negu’s latest minion! Will the Guardians be able to convince the robot to give them back their magical accessories so they can defeat Negu’s henchmen?

programme.title: Samir and the Sky Lamp
programme.desc: Samir plans to launch a lantern into the sky and measure how far it rises but his experiment is cut short by the Grand Vizier. Mild mannered Samir does not argue with authority and obeys the Grand Viziers orders but Jamillah and Aladdin see the injustice of the situation and convince Samir that he should go ahead with his experiment. Unfortunately taking their advice gets Samir arrested. Jamillah, Aladdin and Genie fly Samirs lamp for him and Samir, spurred on by Jamillah and Aladdins example states his case to the Sultan. Samir is delighted when his bravery is rewarded and the Sultan releases him, it turns out the Sultan is also a man of science and is delighted with Samirs experiment, much to the Grand Viziers annoyance.

programme.title: The Heroes’ Path
programme.desc: Xia is bored because it’s been days since Negu sent a Mutant when he finds the instructions for the “Heroes’ Path”. Pai and April laugh at what they think is a silly game for kids, but Xia completes each step with great excitement. When one of the instructions is to steal the Glove of the North, Xia begins to suspect something. Thanks to his quick wits he manages to save the Glove of the North and find out who was behind the “Heroes’ Path” – a mutant fox, sent by Negu.

programme.title: Just A Day’s Work
programme.desc: It is just a usual day in Don’s life and everything goes on as usual. The rat trio is at their nasty best. And Don and Colonel are at their wit’s end. With the entire house going wild, it seems our guys can’t imagine a single day without each other.

programme.title: Runaway Custard
programme.desc: Tiggy is busy making custard and Deedee and Nino are helping out. But Mayor De Pfeffle cannot seem to understand what happened to his purple custard freshly sent over by Nino. So Mewmew offers to help while taking eggs over to Tiggy’s. But the carton turns out to only have one egg, and Tiggy needs to make eight more jars of purple custard. The answer seems to lie in Deedee’s magic spell that makes one purple custard jar never run out of purple custard for the entire day. And it works like a charm, non-stop purple custard. The Mayor gets a half eaten jar of purple custard and keeps it safe for after, only to have it finished by the Doobydoos. As the Mayor turns up at Tiggy’s once more for more purple custard, he rushes off with the jar that the spell has been cast on. A happy Mayor gets Mewmew to stay guard of the jar while he is out, and Mewmew catches the Doobydoos red handed trying to eat the custard. But the jar tips over in the confusion and unknown to Mewmew the loyal custard guard, the bottle keeps on flowing till it reaches the ground floor. Deedee is called in urgency and only Nino can fly up the building and put the jar right up again. Having done that they call all the townsfolk to come to town hall to eat up as much purple custard as they can. All join in and have a hearty treat, so much so that they cannot have a bite more. Finally Mayor De Pfeffle arrives and is happy to share his purple custard with everyone, but much to his surprise no one wants any. Wonder why?

programme.title: Sing For Your Supper
programme.desc: Deedee is excited to prepare for Mayor De Pfeffle’s banquet the next night, so she is all ready for the much needed sleep and yawns away on her cosy bed. But she and all of Abra-Dabra is wide-awake because of Luciano’s late night opera rehearsal. The next day everyone is so sleepy eyed that they request Luciano as politely as ever possible that they could all sleep if Luciano didn’t sing at night. But Luciano is outraged and declares he will never sing ever again. Thinking that the problem is solved they all return to their homes to practice for the upcoming banquet. Deedee tries out a food invisibility spell on an apple, but ended making all the fruits on the table disappear. But the magic didn’t happen only in Deedee’s house, but all over Abra-Dabra in an alarming rate that Mayor De Pfeffle had to ask Deedee to find a way to reverse it. But when she turns back to her usual self and cannot find Nino, she sings out Nino’s name that make a cherry fruit pop up in a tree, and she is amazed to note that more singing brings the food back. So she rounds up all of Abra-Dabra to sing together to bring the food back. They are able to bring back some of the food, but not just enough for the banquet, so Deedee asks Mayor De Pfeffle to request Luciano to help them out. But Luciano is too puffed up in pride and indignation that he outrightly refuses. Mayor De Pfeffle has no other choice but to postpone the banquet. Discouraged and hungry, Deedee sings a little and gets a small morsel to give her hungry friends, but just then her plate is so full of food when Luciano sings out. He even comes to town-hall where he sings his best and all the food comes back. Overjoyed, Mayor De Pfeffle asks if Luciano would grace the banquet with his awesome talent. Luciano agrees to sing promising to all that he will never again disturb them at night.

programme.title: Water Of Life – Shoemaker & The Elves
programme.desc: SANDRA and her assistant FO are called out by a SHOEMAKER, from the story of the “Elves and the Shoemaker”, by the Brothers Grimm. The elves have gone mad and have extraordinary strength; they have destroyed the SHOEMAKER’s workshop and the town hall. Then, they went into the town arsenal and are about to set light to all the gunpowder. The entire town is in danger. SANDRA and FO will have to unravel the mystery of the elves’ madness and find the Water of Life, the only antidote to turn the dangerous elves back into their usual affable, hard-working selves.

programme.title: Vettai
programme.desc: "They are part of a special task force assembled to tackle cases pertaining to the Indian community and Indian immigrants. The unit is not widely publicized and their work is kept under wraps. Spearheaded by Chief Dayanidhi, the team consists of three teams and an assigned criminologist. Together they try to tackle cold blooded murders, kidnaps and sexual crimes. But as their professional and personal lives collide, the team is headed towards a perilous outcome. Lives will be lost and bonds will be broken. The pledge that they made to uphold justice and peace in the country that they love will be put to the test. How will they survive? Where does it all lead to? Who is the villain and who is the hero?"

programme.title: SEHMAT
programme.desc: The story centers around a young woman named Sehmat, who is eagerly anticipating her Muklawa, a traditional Punjabi custom that marks the first meeting between a newlywed couple. Sehmat has been in love with her husband Joginder since they were married as children, and she is excited to finally be reunited with him. However, on the day of their Muklawa, Joginder, who is an army man, is called away to fight in a war. The film then follows the emotional journey of Sehmat and Joginder as they navigate the difficulties of their separation and the choices they must make in the face of war. Joginder is torn between his love for Sehmat and his duty to his country, ultimately choosing to put his country first. This decision leaves Sehmat feeling both sad and proud, as she realizes the sacrifice that Joginder has made for his country. Overall, the film appears to explore themes of love, sacrifice, and patriotism, set against the backdrop of a tumultuous and uncertain time in history.

programme.title: Noah's Ark 1959
programme.desc: Noah gets the word: build an ark in seven days. His sons cut the necessary trees in three days, and much furious sawing and hammering follows. But there's no rest, as they need to round up all the animals. Noah boards the animals, then his sons, their wives, and his wife (who packed a ferocious picnic). The rains and flood begin. The animals soon develop cabin fever and get restless, but Mrs. Noah has the answer: "Music has charms to soothe the savage beast." His sons find instruments and begin playing; everyone dances. But Harry the hippo dances with everyone but his wife; Noah goes to her, and while she tells him not to mention Harry's name, Noah convinces her that Harry is thinking only of her. The rains end; Noah sends a dove out who brings back an olive branch. They land on Mount Ararat and disembark.

programme.title: FULL MOON SESSIONS: Stef Iracet & Zeta Bosio
programme.desc: La luna llena ilumina Miami y el rooftop del W Hotel Brickell se convierte en el escenario perfecto para una sesión única de música electrónica. Disfruta del set especial de Stef Iracet y Zeta Bosio, donde el legendario bajista de Soda Stereo se une a la talentosa DJ argentina para una noche mágica en Full Moon Sessions, el nuevo programa de Chicas Guapas TV. Dejate llevar por los beats, la energía del público y las impresionantes vistas de la ciudad mientras celebramos la música en un ambiente exclusivo.

programme.title: FULL MOON SESSIONS: Yami Safdie & Sarai
programme.desc: El atardecer en Miami se convierte en el escenario perfecto para una sesión acústica única en Full Moon Sessions. Yami Safdie emociona con una interpretación íntima de su hit En Otra Vida, seguida por Sarai, quien cautiva con su propio repertorio, creando una tarde llena de música y momentos especiales. Desde la terraza del W Hotel Brickell, la calidez del sunset y la energía de ambas artistas se combinan con una vista impresionante de la ciudad.

programme.title: PIZZA & MATE: IVANNA ICARDI HABLA DE COSAS INESPERADAS
programme.desc:
Ivanna Icardi es reconocida por su amplia trayectoria en televisión, específicamente en el mundo de los realities, donde ha participado en varios incluyendo algunos de Argentina, España e Italia. Además de ser la hermana del futbolista Mauro Icardi, en este episodio hablamos sobre su carrera, su familia y sobretodo también su futuro laboral: Ivana se ha lanzado como cantante solista!
Este programa fusiona dos mundos irresistibles: el periodismo de actualidad y la auténtica gastronomía italiana. Junto a Sol Macaluso, periodista internacional con una comunidad activa y fiel, y su pareja, Gennaro Arrichiello, pizzaiolo napolitano, ofrecerán un contenido diferente, donde cada episodio traerá conversaciones divertidas con invitados famosos e influyentes. Episodios nuevos cada Jueves por todas las plataformas. @pizzaymate.podcast

programme.title: PIZZA & MATE: LA AZAFATA MÁS FAMOSA
programme.desc:
Esta vez conocemos a la maravillosa Barbie Bac, la azafata más seguida de internet, descubrimos detalles acerca de su trabajo, sus comienzos y su futuro, todo esto mientras cocinamos una pizza y nos divertimos un montón!
Este programa fusiona dos mundos irresistibles: el periodismo de actualidad y la auténtica gastronomía italiana. Junto a Sol Macaluso, periodista internacional con una comunidad activa y fiel, y su pareja, Gennaro Arrichiello, pizzaiolo napolitano, ofrecerán un contenido diferente, donde cada episodio traerá conversaciones divertidas con invitados famosos e influyentes. Episodios nuevos cada Jueves por todas las plataformas. @pizzaymate.podcast

programme.title: Among Us UFO Witnesses And Whistleblowers
Confessions Of A Time Traveler The Man From 3036
Guests Diamond, Abenaa Quïïn, K.H.A.R.I.S.
programme.desc: Yonathan Elias is joined by Diamond, Abenaa Quïïn, K.H.A.R.I.S. who play Couch Party for the Culture and for cash!

programme.title: Guests Be My Fiasco, I Am Sway, Boston Cheez
programme.desc: Contestants answer trivia questions about Capricorn celebrities, trending news, music & entertainment, and Black History & Culture to win cash prizes.

programme.title: El Resurgir de la Momia
programme.desc: Un grupo de estudiantes de arqueología despierta a una momia ancestral. Tras quedar atrapados en un bucle temporal, la única forma de escapar es derrotarla. A medida que aumenta el número de cadáveres, parece que la Momia debe recolectar las almas de quienes la despertaron para poder caminar sobre la tierra, para siempre...

programme.title: Jack y Jill 3
programme.desc: 10 años después de los últimos asesinatos atroces en la colina, Jack y Jill están de regreso para masacrar al elenco y al equipo de un programa de Internet en vivo que busca descubrir los secretos de la leyenda...

programme.title: El Demonio Interior
programme.desc: Años después de salir de la cárcel, Sam Parsons intenta rehacer su vida con su mujer Courtney y su hija Harper. Trabaja duro para mantener a su familia y permitirse una bonita casa en su tranquilo barrio de las afueras. Cuando empiezan a ocurrir sucesos sobrenaturales en la casa, Sam teme por la seguridad de su mujer y su hija. Cuando los sucesos se convierten en ataques, Sam contrata a Corbin Carlysle y a su equipo de cazafantasmas conocido como «The Ghost Killers», para que le ayuden a luchar contra la entidad oscura que acecha en las sombras de su casa. Cuando las cosas empiezan a complicarse y queda claro que esta entidad es mucho más peligrosa que el típico fantasma, surgen complicaciones cuando Corbin y su equipo se centran más en la fama y la fortuna. Para ganar esta lucha Sam debe luchar contra sus propios demonios interiores y volver a su violento pasado. Para salvar a sus seres queridos, un Demonio debe enfrentarse a un Demonio.

programme.title: Calvario "El Bien y El Mal"
programme.desc: En esta vida hay dos modos de vivir, el del bien y el del mal, paralelo y horizontal, esta historia llena de drama, acción y suspenso nos lleva a estos dos lados casi siempre elegimos voluntariamente pero en un conflicto entre la vida y la muerte y por salvar la vida llegas a traicionar a tu mejor amigo sin saber que la vida da vueltas.

programme.title: Bendita Suerte
programme.desc: En la provincia de Oaxaca vive Pedro después de la muerte de su mamá decide de salir de su pueblo para buscar algo mejor ya que no tiene a nadie, se va al pueblo de Ixtapaluca, México. empieza a trabajar muy duro para vivir su sueño de ser cantante. Pero la vida le tiene muchas sorpresas

programme.title: 500 Años de Carcel
programme.desc: En Baja California viven un grupo de delincuentes Gerardo, Clemente, Valdemar, y Benjamin el líder del grupo Christian tiene todo el pueblo bajo control, y sus colegas tienen negocios limpios para que la ley no sospeche nada. Para trabajar en paz compran al jefe de la policía del pueblo, pero no todo lo que brilla es oro ya que las esposas y amantes de estos narcotraficantes están cansadas de las humillaciones de sus parejas, y con la ayuda del comandante planean una venganza mortal.

programme.title: Esposa de Vacaciones
programme.desc: Aprovechando la ausencia de su esposa, un hombre se sumerge en las tentaciones que ofrece el ciber espacio y conoce a una mujer casada. Ellos vivirán un romance idílico sin dimensionar las consecuencias.

programme.title: Aquel Septiembre
programme.desc: En "Septiembre" la vida de Antonio se ve sacudida con el regreso de Carolina, su mejor amigo a quien no ve desde hace 6 años. Esta vez sus planes cambian, el amor comienza a juega con su corazón mientras Julián le hace descubrir los celos que nunca pensó encontraría. Carolina encuentra en Antonio a su mejor confidente y desahogo, sin sabiendo el daño que le hace al decirle todo lo que siente por Julián y hablando con él sobre su confusión por enamorarse de un amigo. Y es que pobre Antonio está enamorado de Carolina, su mejor amiga.

programme.title: El Secuestro
programme.desc: Un joven con talento en la música sueña con ser un gran artista hasta que conoce al hijo de un poderoso narcotraficante colombiano quién promete ayudarlo a cambio de que trabaje para ellos. El joven no se imagina en que mundo se está metiendo. La fama le costará lo que más ama.

programme.title: Amateur
programme.desc: Martín, es un editor que trabaja en un canal de televisión cuyo dueño es el señor Battaglia. Martín se está separando y no tiene donde dormir, por lo que este hombre le ofrece quedarse en uno de sus departamentos en el centro de la cuidad. A la vez a este joven le encomiendan ir al archivo del canal a encontrar una película, pero en dicho lugar todo está desordenado y sin catalogar. A partir de esto, se lleva muchos videos a su nuevo hogar para revisarlos, y entre ellos encuentra uno de tinte erótico que protagoniza una mujer, que luego le será presentada como su vecina Isabel, y esposa de Battaglia. Martín no puede sacarse la imagen de su mente.

programme.title: El Testigo Del Diablo
programme.desc: Cuando una seductora reina vampira decide que es hora de sentar cabeza, limita su búsqueda a cinco candidatos desprevenidos y los atrae a su mansión.

programme.title: El Retorno
programme.desc: Una extraña mujer mantiene expectante y desorientado al espectador cuando a diario habla con su hija y la presencia de su hija no aparece en ningún momento. Una historia no previsible que juega al despiste, por lo que, hay que esperar hasta el final para saber lo que está pasando la protagonista.

programme.title: La Sangre Iluminada
programme.desc: Seis personajes explican su compleja existencia entrelazada. Cada cierto tiempo, debido a matemáticas inexplicables, la vida de estos personajes cambia y ocupan el cuerpo de otro

programme.title: The God Of Answers
programme.desc: In “The God Of Answers,” Pastor Holly Furtick teaches us how to focus on the instructions God has given us while we wait for the promises He has planned for us next.

programme.title: The Blessing Of Letting Go
programme.desc: In “The Blessing Of Letting Go,” Pastor Steven Furtick teaches us that when we worship God in the middle of our situation, it relieves the pressure we feel when we try to handle it on our own.

programme.title: All You've Got To Do Is Don't
programme.desc: We all find ourselves in seasons when we feel like we don’t have what it takes, and we don’t know what to do. But don’t be afraid or discouraged, because God isn’t late — He’s working according to His timing. Don’t lose hope, and don’t give up

programme.title: Lame Excuses
programme.desc: In “Lame Excuses,” Pastor Robert Madu reminds us that we’ve got to stop making excuses and start walking in the purpose God has for us — because His power is made perfect in our weakness.

programme.title: Say Hey By Faith
programme.desc: You’re bigger than what you’re living in. In “Say Hey By Faith,” Pastor Steven Furtick teaches us that just because your current circumstances feel foreign doesn’t mean you’re not currently in the promise.
